import React from 'react' function Rating(props) { const { rating, numReviews } = props; return ( <>
= 1 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating >= 0.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-start' } /> = 2 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating >= 1.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-start' } /> = 3 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating >= 2.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-start' } /> = 4 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating >= 3.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-start' } /> = 5 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating >= 4.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-start' } /> {numReviews} reviews
) } export default Rating;
